code: import*as actionTypes from'./constants';import{fromJS}from'immutable';var defaultState=fromJS({currentAlbum:{},enterLoading:false});export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_ALBUM:return state.set('currentAlbum',action.data);case actionTypes.CHANGE_ENTER_LOADING:return state.set('enterLoading',action.data);default:return state;}});
